text: Approval for the customcornea surgery planning software to be used with the ladarvision 4000 excimer laser system which will allow treatment planning by the practitioner prior to the actual date of surgery.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name ladarvision 4000 excimer laser system and is indicated for the reduction or elimination of myopia up to -7.00 d with less than -0.50 d of astigmatism at the spectacle plane.
